txt.en:
The Tarkrîp defiler is in Nan Wathren in the southern North Downs.

You should defeat the Tarkrîp defiler, for his potions have been used to disastrous effect in Trestlebridge.

<rgb=#FF0000>Fellowship Recommended.</rgb>
You have defeated the defiler responsible for brewing the sleeping draught that led to the catastrophe at Trestlebridge.
The defiler's brewing station can be found in Nan Wathren, deep at the bottom of a flooded gorge.\n\nYou should destroy the defiler's brewing station.
The Tarkrîp defiler is in Nan Wathren in the southern North Downs.\n\nYou should defeat the Tarkrîp defiler, for his potions have been used to disastrous effect in Trestlebridge.
You have defeated the defiler responsible for brewing the sleeping draught that led to the catastrophe at Trestlebridge.
You have destroyed the brewing station used by the Tarkrîp defiler
Somewhere within Nan Wathren lies an enemy potion-brewer, deadly in his craft.
You have defeated the Tarkrîp defiler
Find and defeat the Tarkrîp defiler

Somewhere within Nan Wathren lies an enemy potion-brewer, deadly in his craft.

You should find and defeat the Tarkrîp defiler.
